    • VirtualView

      public VirtualView​(ClientSocketConnection connection, PlayerInfo opponent, PlayerInfo player)
      Allocate a new virtualView Object for two players game
      Parameters:
      connection - the ClientSocketConnection of the player
      opponent - the opponent, used to create a OpponentMessage
      player - the PlayerInfo object used to represent the player

    • VirtualView

      public VirtualView​(ClientSocketConnection connection, PlayerInfo opponent1, PlayerInfo opponent2, PlayerInfo player)
      Allocate a new virtualView Object for three players game
      Parameters:
      connection - the ClientSocketConnection of the player
      opponent1 - the first opponent, used to create a OpponentMessage
      opponent2 - the second opponent, used to create a OpponentMessage
      player - the PlayerInfo object used to represent the player
